description.english: Put a smile on your cloud!

I'll take you to the Nile.
Eye for an Eye.

description.english: A smile written all over the face.
Be light as a feather!

description.english: Just a ball of snow.

description.english: Look at that biceps.

description.english: Have you ever wanted to go to the moon? Now you can become one yourself!
